entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY
PATCHY FOG THIS MORNING
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS THIS MORNING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTHEAST AROUND 5 MPH THIS AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS AROUND 70
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON

CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S

MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS

HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY

LOWS IN THE MID 70S

SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
